revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubiquiti Networks |model=NanoStation Loco M2 |revision=(LOCOM2) |upc=609728683597 |asin=B00DCNRTAG,B004EGI3CI |fcc_date=09/30/2011 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=SWX-M2L |ic_id=6545A-M2L |pcb_id= |pwr_v=24 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64CVFIG |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M13S2561616A |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Gargoyle, DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ubnt |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.20 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|2.4GHz Indoor/Outdoor airMax 8dBi CPE}}
===FCC test results=== * Radiated power (with antenna): 115 dBuV/m peak (802.11b CH1,CH11) :(this is indeed a high gain directional antenna) * Output power (before antenna): 22 dBm peak (802.11b CH6) (158.48mW) :(unit has >10dB output power flatness from CH1 to CH11 :- shit RF PCB design/calibration)
===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/nanostationm2 ''NanoStation M2/Loco M2'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :*M2 - [[Atheros]] AR7240/AR9283, 2x FE ports, 28dBm/11.2dBi :*Loco M2 - [[Atheros]] AR7240/AR9287, 1x FE, 23dBm/8.5dBi
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices#Ubiquiti ''Supported Devices'' table on the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] :Like other UBNT devices, activation seems to be required. :[[Atheros]] AR724x device, DD-WRT wiki says AR7240, :WiFi chip is probably AR9287 (if not, AR9283)
===Reg. third party firmware support=== *''OpenWrt'' and ''Gargoyle'' (.. which is based on OpenWrt) firmware :should work fine on these devices.
===See also=== *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation2]] (NS2) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation5]] (NS5) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation M2]] (M2N) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation M5]] (M5N) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation Loco M2]] (LOCOM2) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation Loco M5]] (LOCOM5) *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation AC (NS-5AC)]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation AC loco (NS-5ACL)]] *[[Ubiquiti Networks NanoStation AC loco (NS-5ACLW)]]
